---
title: "Tidy Exersice"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

Make tidy the two following datasets

```{r}
weather <- read_csv(
  "../../datasets/weather.csv",
  col_types = list(
    .default = col_integer(),
    id = col_character(),
    element = col_character()
  )
)
pew <- read_csv(
  "../../datasets/pew.csv",
  col_types = list(
    .default = col_double(),
    religion = col_character()
  )
)
```
